Aid.name: Aid
Aid.description: You have a +1 morale bonus to attack rolls and saves against fear effects.

Bane.name: Bane
Bane.description: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls and saving throws vs fear effects.

Barkskin.name: Barkskin
Barkskin.description:
Your skin is toughened, granting you an enhancement bonus to your natural armor as per the barkskin spell.

Usage: Set the buff's level to the caster level of Barkskin.

Bear's Endurance.name: Bear's Endurance
Bear's Endurance.description: The subject has a +4 enhancement bonus to Constitution.

Bless.name: Bless
Bless.description: You have a +1 morale bonus to attack rolls and saves against fear effects.

Bull's Strength.name: Bull's Strength
Bull's Strength.description: The subject has a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength.

Cat's Grace.name: Cat's Grace
Cat's Grace.description: The subject has a +4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.

Divine Favor.name: Divine Favor
Divine Favor.description:
You have a luck bonus to attack rolls and weapon damage rolls.

Usage: Set the buff's level equal to the caster level Divine Favor.

Eagle's Splendor.name: Eagle's Splendor
Eagle's Splendor.description: The subject has a +4 enhancement bonus to Charisma.

Fox's Cunning.name: Fox's Cunning
Fox's Cunning.description: The subject has a +4 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.

Haste.name: Haste
Haste.description:
When making a full attack action, you may make one extra attack with one natural or manufactured weapon at your highest base attack bonus. This effect is not cumulative with similar effects, such as that provided by a speed weapon.

You also gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls, dodge AC and Reflex saves.

All your modes of movement (including land, fly, burrow, climb and swim) increase by 30ft, to a maximum of twice your normal speed using that form of movement. This increase counts as an enhancement bonus, and it affects the creature’s jumping distance as normal for increased speed

Heroism.name: Heroism
Heroism.description: You gain a +2 morale bonus on attack rolls, saves, and skill checks.

Inspire Courage.name: Inspire Courage
Inspire Courage.description:
Someone is inspiring you with courage. You gain a morale bonus on saves vs charm and fear effects, and a competence bonus on attack rolls and weapon damage rolls.

Usage: Set the buff's level to the bard level of the person using Inspire Courage.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description:
An invisible but tangible field of force surrounds you, providing a +4 armor bonus to AC.

Since mage armor is made of force, incorporeal creatures can’t bypass it the way they do normal armor.

Owl's Wisdom.name: Owl's Wisdom
Owl's Wisdom.description: The subject has a +4 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.

Prayer (Negative).name: Prayer (Negative)
Prayer (Negative).description: You have a +1 luck bonus on attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, saves and skill checks.

Prayer (Positive).name: Prayer (Positive)
Prayer (Positive).description: You have a +1 luck bonus on attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, saves and skill checks.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description:
An invisible shield of force hovers in front of you, with the following effects:

  • +4 Shield Bonus to AC
  • Negates Magic Missile attacks direct at you

These bonuses apply to incorporeal touch attacks.

Shield of Faith.name: Shield of Faith
Shield of Faith.description:
You have a deflection bonus to AC.

Usage: Set this buff's level equal to the caster level of Shield of Faith.

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description:
You are staggered, and you have a -1 penalty to attack rolls, AC and Reflex saves.

In addition, you move at half speed (round down to the next 5-foot increment).

Touch of Glory.name: Touch of Glory
Touch of Glory.description:
Effect: You gain a bonus equal to the caster cleric level on a single Charisma-based skill check or Charisma ability check.

Duration: One hour or until the creatur elects to apply the bonus to a roll.

Usage: Set this buff's level equal to the caster level of touch of glory.

Current value: [[@item.level]]
